bibl.title: Impacts of Alexandria's Heptastadion on Coastal Hydro-sedimentary Dynamics during the Hellenistic Period: A Numerical Modelling Approach. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Material and methods. - Results: Validation of the current model in the present eastern harbour; - Calibration of the sediment-dynamics model in the present eastern harbour; - Water circulation in the harbours in antiquity: the Heptastadion impact; - Sediment-fluxes in the harbours in antiquity: the Heptastadion impact. - Discussion and conclusion: Numerical models transposition from the present time to antiquity; - The Heptastadion impact on the coastal water and sediment dynamics; - The results reinforce the idea of a desire to protect the eastern harbour against a rapid infilling of sandy sediment.
bibl.seg: Millet Bertrand and Jean-Philippe Goiran, Impacts of Alexandria's Heptastadion on Coastal Hydro-sedimentary Dynamics during the Hellenistic Period: A Numerical Modelling Approach. Avec résumé en anglais.

Material and methods. - Results: Validation of the current model in the present eastern harbour; - Calibration of the sediment-dynamics model in the present eastern harbour; - Water circulation in the harbours in antiquity: the Heptastadion impact; - Sediment-fluxes in the harbours in antiquity: the Heptastadion impact. - Discussion and conclusion: Numerical models transposition from the present time to antiquity; - The Heptastadion impact on the coastal water and sediment dynamics; - The results reinforce the idea of a desire to protect the eastern harbour against a rapid infilling of sandy sediment.
